remarks: A shifted function converges iff the original function converges. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Nov-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Feb-2014.)

climshft2.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` ( k + K ) ) = ( F ` k ) ) $.
